title: To people who have no yet been informed.
body:
"Feminists" got GTA V banned from Target and Kmart stores due to a petition stating that is is misogynist.
See here: https://www.change.org/p/target-withdraw-grand-theft-auto-5-this-sickening-game-encourages-players-to-commit-sexual-violence-and-kill-women

Since then the Aussie's have actually stood up to these demons and starting fighting back by trying to get the Bible banned as well.
See here: https://www.change.org/p/target-withdraw-the-holy-bible-this-sickening-book-encourages-readers-to-commit-sexual-violence-and-kill-women/share?just_signed=true

The Bible petition is only down by about 7k votes, I urge you to please sign it... as "feminism" is just going to continue their campaign on ruining everything.
